content:
Hello Everyone,

I had a question with respect to analyzing the xml files for FHIR or CDA in bulk to observe trends in terms of data errors or irregularities. I am aware that the same can be performed when we deal with dat files for HL7v2.x using tools like HL7spy which gives you statistics in terms of bulk analysis. e.g. 1500 files do not have DG1 segment in the ADT files. Do we have an equivalent in the xml/json world.

Thanks & regards,
Tushar
@Tushar Nair - this stream is primarily focused on defining a FHIR based approach to importing and exporting bulk data - you should probably post this question to the analytics on FHIR stream.

@Tushar Nair - this stream is primarily focused on defining a FHIR based approach to importing and exporting bulk data - you should probably post this question to the analytics on FHIR stream.

Thank you Dan
